CustomField.formula: IF( Lead_Score__c >= 560, IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "5 star rating" ), IF( Lead_Score__c >= 500, IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "4 star rating" ), IF( Lead_Score__c >= 300, IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "3 star rating" ), IF( Lead_Score__c >= 100, IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", "2 star rating" ), IMAGE( "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "1 star rating" )))))
CustomField.label: Lead Score Rating
